{"id":1525767659,"question_id":3593,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â week","timestamp":1738265674,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1525767659/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Maximum Factor Score of Array","memory":"26.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maxScore(vector<int>& nums) {//1 <= nums.length <= 100; 1 <= nums[i] <= 30\n        int n = nums.size();\n        if(n==1)\n            return nums[0] * nums[0];\n        if(n==0)\n            return 0;\n        vector<long long> gcdPre(n, nums[0]), lcmPre(n, nums[0]), gcdSuf(n, nums[n-1]), lcmSuf(n, nums[n-1]);\n\n        for(int i=1; i<n; i++)\n            gcdPre[i] = gcd(gcdPre[i-1], nums[i]);\n        for(int i=1; i<n; i++)\n            lcmPre[i] = lcm(lcmPre[i-1], nums[i]);   \n\n        for(int i=n-2; i>=0; i--)\n            gcdSuf[i] = gcd(gcdSuf[i+1], nums[i]);\n        for(int i=n-2; i>=0; i--)\n            lcmSuf[i] = lcm(lcmSuf[i+1], nums[i]);      \n\n        long long ans = max( {gcdPre[n-1]*lcmPre[n-1], gcdPre[n-2]*lcmPre[n-2], gcdSuf[1]*lcmSuf[1], gcdSuf[0]*lcmSuf[0]} );\n        for(int i=1; i<n-1; i++) {\n            long long a = lcm( lcmPre[i-1], lcmSuf[i+1] );\n            long long b = gcd( gcdPre[i-1], gcdSuf[i+1] );\n            ans = max( ans, a*b);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-maximum-factor-score-of-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
